name: test_12_1_0_View_All_Communities
description:
Test that an admin can view all communities from the CMS.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Postpartum community page
4. Verify visibility of all community groups
5. Check each community individually (Pregnant, Trying to Conceive, Postpartum)

@allure.feature("12.0.0 CMS Communities")
    @allure.epic("Web CMS Testing")
    @allure.story("12.1.0 View All Communities")
    @allure.severity(allure.severity_level.NORMAL)
    @allure.description("""
    Test that an admin can view all communities from the CMS.
    
    Test Steps:
    1. Launch the browser
    2. Login as admin user
    3. Navigate to Postpartum community page
    4. Verify visibility of all community groups
    5. Check each community individually (Pregnant, Trying to Conceive, Postpartum)
    """)
    def test_12_1_0_View_All_Communities():
        with sync_playwright() as p:
            # Launch browser with larger viewport
            browser = p.chromium.launch(headless=False)
            page = browser.new_page(viewport={'width': 1920, 'height': 1080})
    
            # Login using the existing login class
            login_page = LoginPage(page)
            login_page.loginDev(admin_user, admin_pw)
    
            # Navigate to the Postpartum community page
            community_page = CommunityPage(page)
            community_page.go_to_postpartum_community()
    
            # Verify the visibility of all community groups
            community_page.verify_communities_visibility()
    
            # Check each community individually
            community_page.check_pregnant_community()
>           community_page.check_trying_to_conceive_community()
